howData.subtitle: Hello everyone,We are proudly introducing best in class quality Dentures With Affordable budget,For a Celebrity Smile visit,Dr Akshay's Wecare multispeciality dental clinic and orthodontic centre. (We provides Zirconia crowns ðŸ‘‘,Different quantities of Metal free crowns ðŸ‘‘,IVOCLAR CrownsðŸ‘‘ ,PFM crowns ðŸ‘‘,Complete Dentures(CD),Removable Partial Dentures.We use latest techniques and best quality Orthodontic appliances helps minimal period of time. Your smile is our Responsibility,WeCare your smiles.For appointments,book online or visit Dr Akshay's Wecare multispeciality dental clinic and orthodontic centre.

faqData.title: It's not that complicated to do filings on Anterior Tooth,We do miracles with 3M composite Filling Material which will be in your best Budget.Keep smiling and We promises the best in Class quality Treatments with minimal effort and Budget friendly.Wishing you a wonderful blessed Newyear.Keep smiling and Your smile is our Responsibility.Thank you for supporting us.

clients.message: I had visited clinic for tooth ache,Dr Akshay sir explained  my present condition of tooth,I undergone root canal Treatment which was completely painless for me and I was so comfortable after the crown he had put on me,it looks as same like my real tooth,I highly recommend this place.
clients.name: ANITTA POLACHAN

clients.message: I had a great experience here . Dr Akshay sir conducted a very patient and thorough assessment and explained procedures as well.i have been to wecare more than once.i would highly recommend everyone in bengalaru to check out this clinic!!
clients.name: Andu

clients.message: Am so happy with your treatment good sir
clients.name: Raju Sahu
